attributes.action: Scrap second home allowances and build communal living areas for MP's to reside in when in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs have been caught fiddling the books with second home allowances and expenses. So take away the chance for them to fiddle and provide subsidised communal living areas for them (IE apartment blocks etc). If they do not wish to live in these whilst in London, then they should be responsible for their own accomodation costs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
